languages.text: "Интересно". {n}Ксавьер Калькасар задумчиво подпирает рукой подбородок.{/n} "Что ты на это ответишь?"

traits.locale_text: "Интересно". {n}Ксавьер Калькасар задумчиво подпирает рукой подбородок.{/n} "Что ты на это ответишь, Хейнрикс?"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: "How interesting!" {n}Xavier Calcazar pensively rests his chin on his hand.{/n} "What will you say to this?"
languages.original_text: "Интересно". {n}Ксавьер Калькасар задумчиво подпирает рукой подбородок.{/n} "Что ты на это ответишь?"

languages.text: « Comme c'est intéressant ! » {n}Xavier Calcazar se touche le menton de manière pensive.{/n} « Qu'avez-vous à répondre à cela ? »
languages.original_text: "How interesting!" {n}Xavier Calcazar pensively rests his chin on his hand.{/n} "What will you say to this?"

traits.locale_text: « Comme c'est intéressant ! » {n}Xavier Calcazar se touche le menton de manière pensive.{/n} « Qu'avez-vous à répondre à cela, Heinrix ? »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: “这可真是太有趣了！”{n}希维尔·卡尔卡扎若有所思地托着下巴。{/n}“你对此有何看法？”
languages.original_text: "How interesting!" {n}Xavier Calcazar pensively rests his chin on his hand.{/n} "What will you say to this?"

traits.locale_text: “这可真是太有趣了！”{n}希维尔·卡尔卡扎若有所思地托着下巴。{/n}“你对此有何看法，海因里希？”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: 「これは興味深い！」{n}ザビエル・カルカサルは物思いにふけるかのように顎を手の上に置いた。{/n}「これについてどう答える？」
languages.original_text: "How interesting!" {n}Xavier Calcazar pensively rests his chin on his hand.{/n} "What will you say to this?"

traits.locale_text: 「これは興味深い！」{n}ザビエル・カルカサルは物思いにふけるかのように顎を手の上に置いた。{/n}「これについてどう答える？」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: "Sehr interessant!" {n}Nachdenklich stützt Xavier Calcazar sein Kinn auf seiner Hand ab.{/n} "Was habt Ihr dazu zu sagen?"
languages.original_text: "How interesting!" {n}Xavier Calcazar pensively rests his chin on his hand.{/n} "What will you say to this?"

traits.locale_text: "Sehr interessant! {n}Nachdenklich stützt Xavier Calcazar sein Kinn auf seiner Hand ab.{/n} "Was habt Ihr dazu zu sagen, Heinrix?"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: «¡Qué interesante!». {n}Xavier Calcazar apoya pensativamente la barbilla sobre una mano.{/n} «¿Qué tiene que decir a eso?».
languages.original_text: "How interesting!" {n}Xavier Calcazar pensively rests his chin on his hand.{/n} "What will you say to this?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Qué interesante!». {n}Xavier Calcazar apoya pensativamente la barbilla sobre una mano.{/n} «¿Qué tiene que decir a eso, Heinrix?».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: "Çok ilginç!" {n}Xavier Calcazar, düşünceli bir şekilde elini çenesine koyuyor.{/n} "Buna ne diyeceksin?"
languages.original_text: "How interesting!" {n}Xavier Calcazar pensively rests his chin on his hand.{/n} "What will you say to this?"

traits.locale_text: "Çok ilginç!" {n}Xavier Calcazar elini çenesine koymuş, düşünceli bir hâlde duruyor.{/n} "Buna ne diyeceksin?"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar
